title: Ramirez-ke no Hanayome
sinopse:
In the Ramirez-ke no Hanayome series:

1. Kare ga Kekkon suru Riyuu (The Ramirez Bride) [Story: Emma Darcy]
2. Futatsu no Kao wo Motsu Koibito (The Brazilian's Blackmailed Bride) [Story: Michelle Reid]
3. Uruwashiki Lesson (The Disobedient Virgin) [Story: Sandra Marton]
